14159.「待たせたな。来たぜ～ ガウラド。: Sorry to keep you waiting. Here I am, Gaurad.

14160.「<cs_pchero>殿も 来たのですか。\n いいでしょう。歓迎いたしますよ:
<cs_pchero> is here, too? That's fine. You
are welcome to witness this.

14161.「で なんの用なんだ？\n お小言なら もう聞きたくないぜ。\n マジメに やっ:
So what do you want? I don't want to hear any
more of your complaints. I'm trying to be
serious for once.

14163.「は？ 何を言ってるんだ ガウラド。: Huh? What are you talking about, Gaurad?

14164.「超天道士の名を持つ者と\n やっと 闘える日が来ました。:
The day has come when I can fight someone who
bears the title of "Chosen One".

14166.「おいおい。お前の じょうだんは\n 相変わらず つまんねえなあ。\n もっと:
Oi, oi. Your jokes are as boring as ever. At
least try to be funny.

14167.「超天道士を名乗る者を殺し\n その名に宿りし チカラを得る……。\n それが:
I have made it my mission to kill the one who
bears the title of the Chosen One, and make
their power my own...

14169.<pipipi_mid>「超天道士を倒すため 魔界より訪れた使者。\n 武闘魔ガ:
<pipipi_mid>I am Warrior Demon Gaurad... I came from the
Demon World to defeat the Chosen One.

14170.「だが なんということか……。\n 私が目的を果たさんとしたとき 超天道士は\n:
But alas... just as I was about to fulfill my
goal, the previous Chosen One fell gravely ill
and was about to die.

14171.「そんな おとろえた超天道士を倒しても\n チカラを得ることなど できぬ！\n:
I cannot gain power by defeating such a feeble
Chosen One! I must defeat a truly perfect
Chosen One!

14172.「だから 待ったのだ。\n 超天道士の名を継ぐ者が現れる その日を！\n 貴様を:
That is why I waited... for the day an heir to
the title would appear! Once I defeat you, my
mission will be fulfilled!

14173.「くだらねえ……。\n そんなことのために お前は これまで\n オレの世話をし:
You've been taking care of me all this time...
just for this garbage?

14174.「ヤーン！ 超天道士の名を継ぐ者よ！\n さあ 私と闘え！\n そして そのチカ:
Yarn! Heir to the title of Chosen One! Fight
me, and give me your power!

14175.「イヤだね。オレは お前の相手なんか\n これっぽっちも する気ね～よ。:
No. I have absolutely no interest in being
your opponent.

14176.「超天道士の名を継ぐ者が 逃げるのか！？:
Is the heir to the title of Chosen One running
away!?

14177.「ちげ～っつーの。お前なんかじゃ\n オレの相手にならね～って 言ってるんだよ。:
Wrong～, I'm saying that you're no match for
me.

14178.「……そうだな。コイツに勝てたら\n お前の相手をしてやっても いいぜ。:
...Right. If you can beat them, then I'll be
happy to be your opponent.

14179.「<cs_pchero> 悪いが頼むぜ。\n アンタの闘いを 見せてやってくれよ:
Sorry, <cs_pchero>, but I need this favor.
Show him how you fight.

14180.「ガウラド。お前じゃ <cs_pchero>を\n 倒すなんて できね～と思うぜ:
Gaurad. I don't think you can defeat
<cs_pchero>.

14181.「<cs_pchero>を倒せば 貴様が\n この私と闘うと いうのだな……。\:
If I defeat <cs_pchero>, then you will fight
me... do you speak true?

14182.「<cs_pchero>よ。まずは貴様からだ。\n さあ 私の使命のため 消える:
<cs_pchero>. You shall be first. For the
sake of my mission, you must die!

14183.「まさか……。超天道士の名を持たぬ者に\n この私が 敗れる……だと！？:
Impossible... how could I be defeated by
someone who does not have the title of Chosen
One!?

14184.「名前に チカラが宿るわけじゃない。\n お前がしてることには なんの意味もね～:
Titles don't have power. What you're doing
here has no meaning.

14185.「超天道士の名なんか 継いでなくても\n <cs_pchero>は こんだけ 強:
Even without the title of Chosen One,
<cs_pchero> here is still very strong.

14186.「だが 私は 超天道士を倒さねば……。\n 使命を果たさねば 魔界へ帰ることはで:
But I must defeat the Chosen One... if I do
not complete my mission, I can never return to
the Demon World!

14189.「フフ……。なんという強さ……。\n さすが 超天……道士……の……。:
Hehe... such strength... as expected of...
the Chosen... One...

14190.「なあ ガウラド……。オレと お前はさ。\n ずいぶん長く 一緒に暮らしてたよな:
You know, Gaurad... you and I... we've been
living together for a long time. I've said
many selfish things...

14191.「じ～さんが死んだ後も お前がオレの世話を\n 焼いてくれたのは そんな くだら:
You took care of me even after the old man
died, and it wasn't just for the sake of your
stupid mission, was it?

14192.「なのに なぜ いつまでも\n そんな使命に こだわってさ……。\n こんなこと:
So why did you insist on clinging to this
mission... and do something like this...?

14193.「貴様には わかるまい……。\n 魔界に生きる者に 課せられた使命の重さを。:
You have no idea... of the weight placed upon
those given a duty in the Demon World.

14194.「だが……。だが なぜ私は\n その使命を果たさねば ならなかったのか……。\n:
But now... I cannot even remember the reason
why I had to fulfill that mission...

14195.「いつからか 私は 理由もなく\n ただ 与えられた使命を果たすためだけに\n:
Somewhere along the way, I seem to have lived
my life without reason, just to fulfill the
mission I was given...

14196.「……使命のことは もう忘れちまえ。\n そして ゆっくり眠れば いいさ。:
...Forget about your mission. Just get some
rest.

14197.「せめて 最期は……。あなたの知る姿で……。:
At least in my final moments... let me be in
the form you knew...

14198.「私は 使命を果たすことに囚われ……。\n 安息の日など 一日たりとも\n 訪れ:
I was so caught up in fulfilling my mission
that not a single day of rest ever came...

14199.「ただ……なぜか……\n あなたと共に暮らした日々は……。:
It's just... somehow... the days I spent with
you...

14203.「中に コレが入ってたよ。\n 武闘家の証……って 言われてるヤツだ。:
I found this inside. It's called the Proof of
MRT.

14204.「超天道士が死ぬ間際に オレに渡せと言って\n ガウラドのヤツに あずけたらしい:
The previous Chosen One gave it to Gaurad to
pass on to me when he was dying. That's what
the letter says, anyway...

14205.「大事に 持ってやがったんだなあ。\n アイツの使命とは 関係ないモノだろうに。:
He took good care of it, even though it had
nothing to do with his mission.

14206.「……なあ <cs_pchero>。\n 突然だけどさ。オレと勝負してくれよ。\:
...Hey, <cs_pchero>. I know this is sudden,
but... I want you to fight me. There's
something I want to be certain of.

14207.「アンタと拳を交えれば きっと\n その答えが わかるはずなんだよ。:
I'm sure I'll know the answer to my question
once our fists clash.

14208.「本格的に コロシアムで やろうぜ。\n そこの関係者の グララってオーガの女に:
Let's have a fair fight in the Coliseum. I've
already made arrangements with an ogre woman
named Grala there.

14209.「オレは ジュレットの町に ヤボ用がある。\n アンタは 先に ラッカラン島の\:
I have some business to wrap up in Julet. I
want you to go on ahead to the Coliseum on
Luckland Island first.

14210.「<cs_pchero> 今度は イケるよな。\n これまでの修行を 思いだせば:
You'll get it this time, <cs_pchero>. Just
remember everything you've been through. I
know you can win.

14211.「ヤーン。まだ貴様は 闘おうとしないのか？\n 私の使命は 超天道士の名を持つ貴:
Yarn. You still refuse to fight me? My mission
will not be fulfilled until I defeat the one
who bears the title of Chosen One!

14212.「<cs_pchero>は まだ 負けてね～よ。\n お前の前で 倒れてるか？\:
<cs_pchero> hasn't lost yet. Have they
fallen before you? Or are they getting back
up and continuing the fight?

14213.「……相変わらず クチの減らない男だ。\n よかろう。ならば 今度は完全に\n:
...As usual, you like to run your mouth. Very
well. Then this time, I shall be more thorough
in beating you to a pulp!

14214.「よく来てくれた～ <cs_pchero>。\n ここなら ジャマも入らないだろ:
Thanks for coming, <cs_pchero>. No one will
interrupt us here.

14215.「アンタと 拳を交えれば\n オレが確かめたいことの 答えが出るんだ。\n だか:
If we exchange fists, I'll find the answer to
what I want to know. So don't go easy on me.

14216.「……もう 言葉は いらないよな。\n あとは 拳で語り合おうぜ。:
...There's no more need for words. Now, we'll
let our fists do the talking.

14218.「<cs_pchero>……。アンタなら\n また来てくれると 思ってたぜ～。:
<cs_pchero>... I knew you'd come back for
more!

14219.「勝負は まだ ついてないよな？\n <pc>の本気を オレは\n まだ 見せて:
This match isn't over yet, <pc>! I
still haven't had a chance to see what you're
really made of!

14220.「今度は 見せてくれよ～。\n <cs_pchero>の 本気の拳をな！！:
Show it to me this time! Let's see the real
fist of <cs_pchero>!

14221.「ははっ 強いなあ～ <cs_pchero>。\n 超天道士の名を継いだオレが:
Haha, you really are strong, <cs_pchero>. Even
after inheriting the title of Chosen One, I
lost.

14222.「だが ずっと 確かめたかったことが\n アンタと闘って やっと わかった。\n:
But after fighting you, I now have the answer
I've been searching for. Do you want to know
what it is?

14223.「……オレが じ～さんに弟子入りしたのは\n 超天道士って名が 欲しかったからじ:
...I didn't become the old man's disciple
because I wanted the title of Chosen One. It
was because I admired his strength.

14224.「その名を継がなくても 超天道士を超える強さを\n 身につけられると オレは信じ:
I believed that even if I didn't inherit the
title, I could acquire strength beyond that of
the Chosen One.

14225.「だから ずっと 名を継ぐことを避けてたのさ。\n 本気のじ～さんと闘って 勝つ:
That's why I had been avoiding inheriting the
title. I was waiting for the day when I would
be strong enough to win against the old man...

14227.「……本当はさ。超天道士の名を継いだ\n アンタと闘って 勝つつもりだったんだ。:
...The truth is, I was expecting to fight you
as the new Chosen One and win, but it ended up
exactly the opposite.

14228.「だが 超天道士の名を継いだ このオレを\n アンタが 超えてみせてくれた。:
You have surpassed me, the heir to the title
of Chosen One.

14229.「名前が強さを もたらすわけじゃない。\n 強さってのは 人に宿るってことが\n:
Strength does not lie within a title. I can
finally confirm that true strength comes from
within...

14230.「よし……っと。\n <cs_pchero>のおかげで\n いろいろと ふっきれ:
Well then... <cs_pchero>. Thanks to you, I
finally have that load off my shoulders.

14231.「超天道士の名は 今やオレの身体の一部だ。\n この名と共に オレは生きていくよ:
The title of Chosen One is now a part of me. I
will continue to live with this title.

14233.「アンタは いい武闘家になるよ。\n 超天道士のように 伝説に名を残す\n そん:
You are a great martial artist. Great enough
to become a legend on par with the Chosen One.

14234.「このオレが 言うんだ。\n 絶対に まちがいね～って！:
If I'm the one telling you that, then you know
it's not a lie!

14235.「オレに勝ったんだからな。\n コレは アンタに受け取ってほしい。\n ガウラド:
You won against me, so I want you to have
this. It's the Proof of MRT that Gaurad left
behind.

14236.「その武闘家の証は いつか オレが\n 証に ふさわしい男になる日まで\n アン:
I'll leave that Proof of MRT with you until
the day I become a man worthy of it.

14237.「勝者への ごほうびだ。\n コレを アンタに贈らせてもらおう。: A reward for the winner. This is for you.

14238.「オレも 超天道士の名に恥じない\n 武闘家にならなきゃ いけね～からな。\n:
I must become a martial artist who lives up to
the title of Chosen One. I'll work even harder
on my training.

14239.「今度 闘うことがあったら 絶対に負けないぜ。\n 超天道士の名に かけてな！:
If we ever fight again, I'll make sure not to
lose. I swear it on the name of the Chosen
One!
